entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 07:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 4.7°C
Wind: SSE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
